Setting.Name: CssClass
Setting.Help: Sets the Command Name, maps to ModuleActionType in DotNetNuke.Entities.Modules.Actions

Setting.Name: CommandName
Setting.Help: Sets the CSS class used to render this skin object, defaults to 'CommandButton'

Setting.Name: DisplayLink
Setting.Help: Sets whether the link is displayed, defaults to True

Setting.Name: DisplayIcon
Setting.Help: Sets whether the icon is displayed, defaults to False

Setting.Name: IconFile
Setting.Help: Sets the Icon used, defaults to the icon defined in Action

Setting.Name: ButtonSeparator
Setting.Help: Sets the Separator between Buttons, defaults to 2 non-breaking spaces
